ygData.msgSnippet: What runes did you use for the levitate spell? im almost 24 and am going to need it. Arkaine Stormlord Innoruuk Server ... From: Rick  To:
ygData.messageBody:
What runes did you use for the levitate spell? im almost 24 and am going to
need it.


Arkaine Stormlord
Innoruuk Server
-----Original Message-----
From: Rick <stinger@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 17, 1999 7:26 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Velishoul's Tomb


>From: "Rick" <stinger@...>
>
>Ok, BACK to the game now...
>
>First off, thanks to you guys I've accomplished my first Research of a
spell
>and have successfully created a Levitate Spell. Thanks for all the info!
>
>Now, i've come across another type of page and am curious on what to do
with
>it. Rather than being a part of a page like the Grimiore, this is a full
>page Entitled Velishoul's Tombe Page 68.. Just like Tasarin's page it
cannot
>be read like normal documents.
>
>I got this page from a trade with another player for a rune I had found, so
>I am unaware of it's source.
>
>Also, anyone notice an abundance of left sided portions of grimiore pages?
I
>rarely find the right side portion. Is it just my bad luck to always find
>the left side (I have 8 of them), or is the right side the rarer side?
>
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Got an opinion?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research.
Please keep the emails on topic.
>
